attributes.action: give an immediate undertaking that the taxpayer will not be required to fund bonuses for failed bankers who are in the employ of the RBS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If McBroon doesn't have the balls to say no then he should go to the country and ask for a mandate to spend yet more of our money bailing out failed businesses.  To give any more money to people for failure is tantamount to theft and after he has been dumped out of power at the next general election I will be one of the people coming after him to get him into court and into jail for the theft he has perpetrated AND I AM UTTERLY RELENTLESS IN MY PURSUIT OF BROWN AND BLAIR FOR WHAT THEY HAVE DONE TO THIS COUNTRY.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
